https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5EyDLx7ea4ysBcvf8pdV6RyR6ut.jpg A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting must pick up his gun again to do battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist. Disturbing the Peace
